channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- AIX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- AIX

item.title: CVE-2022-22350|2024-08-03T03:14:54.625Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in CAA to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 220394.

item.title: CVE-2022-22444|2024-08-03T03:14:54.990Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a local user to exploit a vulnerability in the lpd daemon to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 224444.

item.title: CVE-2022-39164|2024-08-03T11:10:32.540Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX kernel to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 235181.

item.title: CVE-2022-43848|2024-08-03T13:40:06.410Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX perfstat kernel extension to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 239169.

item.title: CVE-2022-36768|2024-08-03T10:14:28.435Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the invscout command to obtain root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 232014.

item.title: CVE-2022-43849|2024-08-03T13:40:06.627Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX pfcdd kernel extension to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 239170.

item.title: CVE-2022-39165|2024-08-03T11:10:32.609Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in CAA to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 235183.

item.title: CVE-2022-43382|2024-08-03T13:32:58.389Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1could allow a local user with elevated privileges to exploit a vulnerability in the lpd daemon to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 238641.

item.title: CVE-2022-41290|2024-08-03T12:42:44.067Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the rm_rlcache_file command to obtain root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 236690.

item.title: CVE-2022-40233|2024-08-03T12:14:39.819Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX TCP/IP kernel extension to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 235599.

item.title: CVE-2022-43380|2024-08-03T13:32:57.397Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX NFS kernel extension to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 238640.

item.title: CVE-2022-22351|2024-08-03T03:14:54.612Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged trusted host user to exploit a vulnerability in the nimsh daemon to cause a denial of service in the nimsh daemon on another trusted host. IBM X-Force ID: 220396

item.title: CVE-2022-43381|2024-08-03T13:32:58.834Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX SMB client to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 238639.

item.title: CVE-2022-47990|2024-08-03T15:02:36.652Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description:
IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3 and VIOS , 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in X11 to cause a buffer overflow that could result in a denial of service or arbitrary code execution. IBM X-Force ID: 243556.
â€ƒ

item.title: CVE-2024-27273|2024-08-02T00:27:59.896Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX's Unix domain (AIX 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1) datagram socket implementation could potentially expose applications using Unix domain datagram sockets with SO_PEERID operation and may lead to privilege escalation. IBM X-Force ID: 284903.

item.title: CVE-2024-27260|2024-08-02T00:27:59.799Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX could 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1 allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the invscout command to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 283985.

item.title: CVE-2024-27260|2024-06-04T17:47:20.145Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX could 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1 allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the invscout command to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 283985.

item.title: CVE-2024-27273|2024-05-07T20:17:47.250Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX's Unix domain (AIX 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1) datagram socket implementation could potentially expose applications using Unix domain datagram sockets with SO_PEERID operation and may lead to privilege escalation. IBM X-Force ID: 284903.

item.title: CVE-2024-25021|2024-02-22T11:39:41.641Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.3, VIOS 4.1's Perl implementation could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 281320.

item.title: CVE-2024-27273|2024-07-23T17:02:15.061Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX's Unix domain (AIX 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1) datagram socket implementation could potentially expose applications using Unix domain datagram sockets with SO_PEERID operation and may lead to privilege escalation. IBM X-Force ID: 284903.
